snippet: The Knicks will play the Pistons on Thursday before a capacity crowd in London, but that doesn’t mean interest in the sport is intense.
abstract: Britain's overall interest in professional basketball remains mild, despite fact that sold-out crowd will attend upcoming game in London between the New York Knicks and Detroit Pistons.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks will play the Pistons on Thursday before a capacity crowd in London, but that doesn’t mean interest in the sport is intense.

headline.seo: Basketball in Britain Remains Something of a Tough Sell
headline.main: In Britain, Basketball Can Be a Tough Sell
